House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01837
FULL TITLE : AN ACT DEFINING AND CLASSIFYING EMPLOYMENT RELATIONSHIP AMENDING FOR THIS PURPOSE ARTICLES 279, 280 AND 281 OF PRESIDENTIAL DEGREE NO. 442, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE LABOR CODE OF THE PHILIPPINE, AS AMENDED
ABSTRACT : Aims to end “endo”, or the practice of “5-5-5’ or “6-6-6” end-of-contract work arrangements-a form of abusive ‘contractualization’ thereby strengthen the right of security of tenure by providing that all employees, irrespective of employment status or position, shall not be dismissed without cause and due process.
